properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 2:53PM PST until January 9 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

.IN THE MAIN CHANNEL...

- GENERAL SEAS...Around 7 to 8 ft through Thursday.

- FIRST EBB...Strong ebb around 3 PM Wednesday. Seas to 11 ft
with breakers likely.

- SECOND EBB...Around 330 AM Thursday. Seas near 10 ft with
breakers possible.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 5 PM PST this
afternoon. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 2 AM to 6 AM PST
Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 6 AM PST THURSDAY
